name: Der Professor: Supporter Edition
description:
Der Professor is a Arena FPS by PatchNoteStudio. It takes place in a fictional world. This world is infected by a virus. And now do what you do best. Shoot them all off and save the world. Be my .. I mean ... OUR hero!

This game includes a multiplayer. Play against other players around the world on 4 different Maps. The multiplayer is included for free (with restrictions) in the Free Version. So you can easily play with your friends.

UPDATE: The server of Der Professor are no longer available (Server Browser still works, Master Game Server is offline).

Minimum:
OS: XP(SP3)/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz or equivalent
Memory: 2GB RAM
Hard Drive: 4GB of free space
Graphics: NVIDIA 8800GS / ATI Radeon HD 2900 Pro or equivalent
To play the game is necessarily a one-time online activation.

The itch.io version is DRM free!

Patchnotestudio.com / @Twitter / @Facebook
